title: AI Started As A Dream To Save Humanity. Then, Big Tech Took Over.
content: Many AI builders say this tech promises a path to utopia. Others say it could bring about the collapse of our civilization. In reality, the science-fiction scenarios have distracted us from the more insidious ways AI is threatening to harm society.
summary: Many AI builders say this tech promises a path to utopia. Others say it could bring about the collapse of our civilization. In reality, the science-fiction scenarios have distracted us from the more insidious ways AI is threatening to harm society.

title: Musk Denies Report His xAI In Talks Over Tesla Revenue
content: The Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday that Tesla would license xAI's artificial-intelligence models to help power its driver-assistance software
summary: The Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday that Tesla would license xAI's artificial-intelligence models to help power its driver-assistance software

title: iPhone 16 Launch Today: Your Questions Answered On What To Expect From Apple
content: Apple is gearing up for its much-anticipated It's Glowtime' event on September 9, 2024. The tech giant's September events have traditionally centred around new flagship devices.
summary: Apple is gearing up for its much-anticipated It's Glowtime' event on September 9, 2024. The tech giant's September events have traditionally centred around new flagship devices.

title: How Olympic Rings On Eiffel Tower Turned Into Political Battle In France
content: The Olympic rings will remain on the Eiffel Tower until at least 2028, Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo has announced. The rings were mounted ahead of the Paris Olympics and became a popular tourist attraction.
summary: The Olympic rings will remain on the Eiffel Tower until at least 2028, Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo has announced. The rings were mounted ahead of the Paris Olympics and became a popular tourist attraction.

title: "Prosecutor, Convicted Felon Facing Off": Expert On Harris, Trump Debate
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump are due to meet for the first time in front of a prime-time television audience of millions.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump are due to meet for the first time in front of a prime-time television audience of millions.

title: As Gaza War Rages, Netanyahu Rival Calls Iran, Hezbollah "Real Issues"
content: Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah have been trading near-daily cross-border fire, with the Lebanese group saying it is acting in support of its Palestinian ally Hamas in the ongoing war in Gaza.
summary: Israel and Iran-backed Hezbollah have been trading near-daily cross-border fire, with the Lebanese group saying it is acting in support of its Palestinian ally Hamas in the ongoing war in Gaza.

title: Watch: Drone Helps Rescue 3-Year-Old Lost In Dark Corn Field In US
content: With darkness making the search difficult, authorities deployed a thermal drone to scan the dense 6-foot-tall cornfield.
summary: With darkness making the search difficult, authorities deployed a thermal drone to scan the dense 6-foot-tall cornfield.

title: Watch: Kamala Harris Campaign Gets A Desi Touch With Hindi Music Video
content: Inspired by the Oscar-winning track "Naatu Naatu", the song aims to mobilise South Asian voters for Indian-origin Kamala Harris in the US elections.
summary: Inspired by the Oscar-winning track "Naatu Naatu", the song aims to mobilise South Asian voters for Indian-origin Kamala Harris in the US elections.

title: Why It Needed 2,000 Cops To Arrest Pastor On FBI's Most Wanted List
content: Influential pastor Apollo Quiboloy, who was wanted on charges of child and sexual abuse, was arrested in the Philippines on Sunday.
summary: Influential pastor Apollo Quiboloy, who was wanted on charges of child and sexual abuse, was arrested in the Philippines on Sunday.

title: "India Has To Think About The Act Of Production": Rahul Gandhi In US
content: India, the US and other countries in the West are facing the problem of unemployment while China isn't as it is dominating global production, Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi said.
summary: India, the US and other countries in the West are facing the problem of unemployment while China isn't as it is dominating global production, Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi said.

title: Apple AI To Star At iPhone 16 Series Launch? All Eyes On "Glowtime" Event
content: Apple has a lot riding on what would be the iPhone 16 and will hope that customers will be enticed to buy the latest models, attracted by new AI powers.

title: Imran Khan's Party Issued Warning For Defying Rules, Clashes With Police
content: Imran Khan's party, Pakistan Tehreek-E-Insaf, was issued a warning by the local administration to adhere to the rally's NOC guidelines, which mandated them to vacate the venue by 7pm, ARY News reported.
summary: Imran Khan's party, Pakistan Tehreek-E-Insaf, was issued a warning by the local administration to adhere to the rally's NOC guidelines, which mandated them to vacate the venue by 7pm, ARY News reported.

title: "If You're Positioned Properly, It's An Opportunity": Rahul Gandhi On AI
content: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi said on Monday that the Artificial Intelligence (AI) can be a good opportunity if one is positioned properly.

title: Israeli Strikes In Central Syria Kill 7, Says War Monitor
content: Israeli strikes in central Syria killed at least seven people late Sunday, including three civilians, a war monitor reported.
summary: Israeli strikes in central Syria killed at least seven people late Sunday, including three civilians, a war monitor reported.

title: China, Russia Send Greetings To Kim Jong On N Korea's Founding Anniversary
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin sent greetings to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of North Korea's founding anniversary, state media KCNA said on Monday.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin sent greetings to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of North Korea's founding anniversary, state media KCNA said on Monday.

title: US House Republican Report Blasts Biden Over Chaotic Afghan Withdrawal
content: U.S. House of Representatives Republicans will release a long-awaited report on Monday blasting Democratic President Joe Biden's administration for failures surrounding the chaotic and deadly U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan in August 2021.
summary: U.S. House of Representatives Republicans will release a long-awaited report on Monday blasting Democratic President Joe Biden's administration for failures surrounding the chaotic and deadly U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan in August 2021.

title: "Bharat Jodo Yatra Introduced The Idea Of Love In Politics": Rahul Gandhi
content: Rahul Gandhi, the Leader of the Opposition in Lok Sabha, while interacting with the students at the University of Texas, Dallas in the US, said that Bharat Jodo Yatra introduced the idea of love in politics.

title: Drought Sinks Longest Polish River To Record-low Level
content: Poland's longest river, the Vistula, on Sunday hit a record-low water level in the capital because of drought, the national weather agency said.
summary: Poland's longest river, the Vistula, on Sunday hit a record-low water level in the capital because of drought, the national weather agency said.

title: Thousands Defy Roadblocks In Rally For Pakistan Ex PM Imran Khan
content: Thousands of supporters of Pakistan's former prime minister Imran Khan gathered in Islamabad on Sunday despite authorities' attempts to block the protesters' main routes into the capital, AFP journalists noted.
summary: Thousands of supporters of Pakistan's former prime minister Imran Khan gathered in Islamabad on Sunday despite authorities' attempts to block the protesters' main routes into the capital, AFP journalists noted.

title: Ukraine Attacks Oil Storage Depot In Russian Border Region
content: The governor of Russia's southern Belgorod region said on Sunday Ukrainian forces attacked a fuel depot, triggering a series of fires after Moscow and Kyiv accused each other of launching overnight attacks on border regions.
summary: The governor of Russia's southern Belgorod region said on Sunday Ukrainian forces attacked a fuel depot, triggering a series of fires after Moscow and Kyiv accused each other of launching overnight attacks on border regions.
